CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 10;Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . The applicant worked as a journalist for the NORP DATE newspaper “ Özgür Gündem ” .

CARDINAL . On DATE “ PERSON ” published an article with the title “ CARDINAL New Books by ORG ” , written by the applicant . On DATE , the copies of the newspaper were confiscated by an order of ORG .

CARDINAL . In the impugned article , the applicant reviewed CARDINAL books written by CARDINAL different authors who discussed problems related to GPE 's southeastern region . The first book reviewed in the article , “ Tasfiyeciliğin Tasfiyesi ” ( “ Liquidation of Liquidators ” ) , was written by PERSON , the leader of the ORG .
CARDINAL . NORP Under this heading the author expressed his views in the following terms :

“ Combating ' liquidation ' ( tasfiye ) is of paramount importance for every revolutionary movement . There is hardly any great movement in which ' liquidation ' ( tasfiye ) does not exist . PERSON , the General Secretary of the ORG , examined the characteristics of the liquidators and the destructive damage they caused in the struggle . He reveals his determination on this issue by declaring : ' I will not hesitate even if I have to sacrifice the whole party in order to liquidate CARDINAL of them ' .

In this connection , a further success of the ORG is its never ceasing firm struggle against ' liquidation ' ( tasfiye ) . The ORG has revealed facts that almost no other revolutionary movement managed to do . This discipline and determination of the ORG may give an idea about its prospective system and the characteristics of its creators .

The ORG has , in this sense , diagnosed at the right time the ' liquidation ' ( tasfiye ) tendencies which would lead the revolution to defeat , took measures against possible damage , organised the struggle to save the revolution 's origins and thus has carried the revolution further to victory . These issues are explicitly taken up and evaluated in the book . ' ORG ( Tasfiyeciliğin Tasfiyesi ) is not a theoretical work , nor a book written after examination of the relevant literature . On the contrary , it is a book that collects in chronological order the evaluations on the problem of ' liquidation ' ( tasfiye ) , encountered in practice during a long and hard struggle . The book is in this respect a documentary , including information and instructive lessons not only for ORG for GPE but also for all class or national liberation movements in the world . ”

CARDINAL . NORP The titles of the other books reviewed in the same article are “ History of Colonisation ” and “ From DATE , the national problem and GPE and “ The Cease - fire declared by the ORG and its Effects ” . Under the last article , the applicant stated :

“ ... [ the ] Cease fire , which was declared on DATE by the ORG did not reach its goal , on the contrary , [ it ] continued the dirty war in GPE . In fact , the guerrillas blocked the ORG - Bitlis highway on DATE killed CARDINAL soldiers and the cease fire , which had not been responded to , ended . ”

CARDINAL . On DATE , the public prosecutor at ORG charged the applicant with disseminating propaganda about an illegal separatist terrorist organisation . The charges in the indictment were brought under LAW ( Law no . ORG ) .
CARDINAL . NORP The public prosecutor based his indictment on the following sentences from the applicant 's article :

“ ... In this connection , a further success of the ORG is its never ceasing firm struggle against liquidation . The ORG has revealed facts that almost no other revolutionary movement managed to do . This discipline and determination of the ORG may give an idea about its prospective system and the characteristics of its creators .

The ORG has , in this sense , diagnosed at the right time the liquidation tendencies which would lead the revolution to defeat , took measures against possible damage , organised the struggle to save the revolution 's origins and thus has carried the revolution further to victory ... ”
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG found the applicant guilty of the offence under LAW and sentenced him to DATE imprisonment and to a fine of MONEY ( GPE ) .
CARDINAL . In its reasoning the court pointed out the following passage in the article :

“ ... In this connection , a further success of the ORG is its never ceasing firm struggle against liquidation ... The ORG has , in this sense , diagnosed at the right time the liquidation tendencies which would lead the revolution to defeat , took measures against possible damage , organised the struggle to save the revolution 's origins and thus has carried the revolution further to victory ... ”

CARDINAL . The court , taking into consideration the above - mentioned remarks of the author and the impugned article as a whole , held that the applicant had disseminated propaganda about the ORG while reviewing books written by the leader and leading members of the ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE , ORG upheld the judgment of ORG .

CARDINAL . Following the judgment of ORG the applicant disappeared in order to avoid imprisonment . He was apprehended on DATE and taken into custody . On DATE the applicant was released from custody . On DATE ORG suspended the execution of his sentence pursuant to Law no . CARDINAL .
